content:
Russian invaders continue to fire the border areas of Chernihiv, Sumy and Kharkiv regions. In total, 85 shelling (568 explosions) from different types of weapons were charged during the day.

About thisinformsOperational Command "North".

Three communities of Chernihiv region were under enemy shelling.

Snovsk community:

  • Jens - 2 shelling: 14 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm;
  • Keris - 2 shelling: 6 explosions, probably 120 mm mortar; 3 shelling: 3 explosions, probably FPV-Dron.
  • Mountain - 3 explosions, probably barrel artillery.

Semeniv community:

  • Spinning - 4 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Novgorod-Siversky community:
